mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.user_real_name FROM points_history p JOIN USER_INFO u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.date_issued DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO points_history (type, amount, earning_source, spending_source, user_id, order_code, comment) VALUES (#{type}, #{amount}, #{earningSource}, #{spendingSource}, #{userId}, #{orderCode}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_earned_points FROM points_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 'earned'
